alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Polk; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:48PM CDT until August 12 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rhea County in east Tennessee... Northern Bradley County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Loudon County in east Tennessee... Meigs County in east Tennessee... Northern Polk County in east Tennessee... McMinn County in east Tennessee... Western Monroe County in east Tennessee... East central Hamilton County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 247 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Spring City to 7 miles south of Decatur to near Cleveland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. Law enforcement reported numerous trees and powerlines down for portions of Hamilton and Rhea counties. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Athens, Sweetwater, Loudon, Madisonville, Decatur, Benton, Etowah, Charleston, and Englewood. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 23 and 70. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; Hamilton; Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Polk; Rhea; Roane
